name: PKAddPaymentPassRequest
desc: Contains the card data needed to add a card to Apple Pay.

items.name: var encryptedPassData: Data?
items.desc: An encrypted JSON file containing the sensitive information needed to add a card to Apple Pay.

items.name: var ephemeralPublicKey: Data?
items.desc: The ephemeral public key used by elliptic curve cryptography (ECC).
